archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Metingen van energietransport en -netten ter beschikking stellen
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om de metingen van energietransport en -netten te verwerken en te verspreiden.

properties.value: Distribute measurements of energy transport and energy grids
The ability to process measurements of energy transport and energy grids and make them availabe to other capabilities.
